page.title: 15BUSINESS FAIRLIGHT, E.SUSSEX
page.content:
There are four hotels, four public houses, one restaurant and one cafe in the Fairlight area of East Sussex. All of the pubs have eating facilities, two of them have 'restaurant' rooms. These facilities are well used by local residents all year as well as visitors during the summer months.
The four garages not only provide for the high percentage of the population who own cars, but also the tourists who come here from Easter to September
Another local trade which depends on tourism for it's success is the roadside farmshop. There are three in this area; one on the main Hastings to Rye road and benefits from through traffic, and two on the scenic coastal route, Fairlight Road.
